div.p:
Our price for printing Botanical Work shown to us by Mr Luehmann
The work eventually published as B76.12.04.
will be as follows (Estimated to make 240 pages Demy 8vo.
Demi octavo? )

cell.p: Corrections and alterations to be charged 1/6 per hour extra.

font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
Should the work make more or less than 240 pages, a proportionate reduction or increase, as the case may be, to be made. — We may be allowed to draw attention to the fact that we have just completed a reprint of Hayter's Year Book for the Government, and given complete satisfaction.
See M to J. MacPherson, 21 September 1876.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Trusting to be favoured with your order
